alert.note: Alert for Alger; Houghton; Keweenaw; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:43PM EST until February 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and lake effect snow expected. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches tonight, then additional lake effect snow amounts of 3 to 7 inches Friday morning through late Friday night, except 1 to 3 inches in southern Houghton County. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph leading to areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Alger, Luce, Northern Houghton, Keweenaw and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills of 15 to 25 below zero Friday night could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Houghton; Keweenaw; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft
